spell.name: Cocoa Cloud
entries: A gentle cocoa-scented mist envelops one creature of your choice within range.
* At the start of each of its turns, the target gains {@damage 1d4} temporary hit points, up to a maximum pool of 5 × your proficiency bonus temp-HP from this spell.
* The creature can use an action to take a hearty sip, ending the spell on itself and regaining {@damage 1d8} hit points.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 3rd level or higher, the maximum temp-HP pool increases by 5 × your proficiency bonus for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dairy Defense
entries: Foamy cream whirls around you, negating the spell that triggered this reaction as if by counterspell. For the rest of the round, a 10-foot splash surrounds you.

When a hostile creature enters that splash for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Dexterity saving throw; on a failure, it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 3rd level or higher, you may protect one additional creature within 30 feet from the triggering spell for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Whipped Cream Wall
entries: You create a frothy white wall up to 20 feet long, 10 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts for the duration and grants three-quarters cover to creatures behind it.

A creature that crosses the wall must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained until the end of its next turn. The wall has 15 hit points, is vulnerable to fire, and is immune to poison and psychic damage.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 3rd level or higher, the wall’s length increases by 10 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Caramel Quagmire
entries: You liquefy the ground in a 10-foot-radius circle into sticky caramel. The area is difficult terrain.

A creature that enters the area or starts its turn there must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained by the goo. A restrained creature can use an action to make a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check against your spell save DC, freeing itself on a success.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Cocoa Spray
entries: A 20-foot cone of pressurised cocoa erupts from your cup (or your porter’s space). Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw.
* Failure: The creature takes {@damage 3d8} bludgeoning damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn.
* Success: The creature takes half damage and is not blinded.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
